Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/Madison
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Madison, Hamlin, Jackson and Pulaski, due to street blockage near Pulaski/Madison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, Madison, Hamlin, Jackson and Pulaski, due to street blockage near Pulaski/Madison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Jackson. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Jackson.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
